content.rendered:
Business Class passengers are allowed to bring on-board two 2 pieces of maximum 10kg per piece (where airport security permits) the sum of the two dimensions of each piece must nor exceed 115cm

Economy Class Passengers are allowed to bring on-board one 1 piece of maximum 10kg the sum of the one dimension must not exceed 115cm.
